layout.singingstanza: Our God is liv -- ing— say, Hal -- le -- lu -- jah! He's liv -- ing in us— say, Hal -- le -- lu -- jah! We taste His rich -- es, He is our por -- tion. Just say 'O Lord' to taste and see.

lyrics.stanza: Our God is living—say, Hallelujah! He's living in us—say, Hallelujah! We taste His riches, He is our portion. Just say 'O Lord' to taste and see.
We come together—there's nothing better— For in the Spirit we are His family, His living Body! We just express Him. Jesus is our reality.
In all the churches we're being filled now For the saturation throughout the nation, To spread our Jesus To every city— This land will see the living Christ.
